template.name: General Information
template.comment: General Information ------------------- SCF calculation type: DFT Wavefunction type: closed shell. No. of atoms : 11 No. of electrons : 96 Alpha electrons : 48 Beta electrons : 48 Charge : 0 Spin multiplicity: 1 Use of symmetry is: on ; symmetry adaption is: on Maximum number of iterations: 30 AO basis - number of functions: 176 number of shells: 70 A Charge density fitting basis will be used. CD basis - number of functions: 395 number of shells: 150 An Exch-Corr fitting basis will be used. XC basis - number of functions: 395 number of shells: 150 Convergence on energy requested: 1.00D-06 Convergence on density requested: 1.00D-05 Convergence on gradient requested: 5.00D-04
